name: Hebrew Mozilla
short_description: We provide a Hebrew version of Mozilla Firefox, Mozilla Thunderbird, SeaMonkey and Mozilla Application Suite. SeaMonkey/Mozilla Suite are also available for download from here, while the latest Firefox & Thunderbird are available only from mozilla.com.
